column1: Dinodas was the sixth child and youngest son of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]]. He attended [[Bilbo Baggins

Like most male Brandybuck names, ''Dodinas'' is a [[Celtic]] name of unknown meaning. ''Dodynas'' and ''Dinodes'' are both alternate spellings of the Table Knight Sir Dodinas le Savage.<ref>Christopher W. Bruce (ed.), ''The Arthurian Name Dictionary'', entry for ''Dodinel'',p. 148</ref>
